Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using configuration settings.
Docs.remarks: The configuration keys are: WebexAccessToken: An access token for the bot. WebexPublicAddress: The root URL of the bot application. WebexSecret: The secret used to validate incoming webhooks. WebexWebhookName: A name for the webhook subscription.

The method to call for the resulting bot turn.
Cancellation token.
Docs.summary: Sends a proactive message from the bot to a conversation.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.
Docs.remarks:
Call this method to proactively send a message to a conversation. Most _channels require a user to initialize a conversation with a bot before the bot can send activities to the user.
This method registers the following services for the turn.
(key = "BotIdentity"), a claims claimsIdentity for the bot.
